segments.text: How can she just stand there while the sink overflows?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's making a huge mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too busy with that stupid plate to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are up to no good on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're raiding the cookie jar like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's going to break his neck on that thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she watching them properly?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging him, reaching for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible, all of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice yard, but inside it's a wreck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, water everywhereâ€” what a slob.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's fixing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies should be off-limits without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR
